title: Armed forces ordered to open fire at looters & those who cause bodily harm
body_lines: Colombo (News 1st); Armed forces have been given the order to open fire at anyone looting public property or causing harm to others, announced the Defence Ministry of Tuesday (10)
‘Do not resort to violence, if not will be compelled to strictly enforce the law’ – Defence Secretary
